remarks: Apartness of reals is tight.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-pre-apti . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 29-Jan-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: axpre-apti $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ -. ( A <RR B \/ B <RR A ) ) -> A = B ) $.
